title: SIX BY SONDHEIM
description: This is the acclaimed HBO documentary about the life and work of Stephen Sondheim, the greatest writer of musicals in the second half of the 20th century. HBO has shown no inclination to make this commercially available - which is pity, since the only other copy I've seen was a horrid version on YouTube. The source is a DVD sent to Emmy voters For Consideration. "For Your Consideration" pops up several times during the 90-minute film, but it's not that much of a distraction.
